solstick.configuration.title: SOLStick Configs
How many recently eaten foods are tracked. Oldest entries are removed first when full.
Rolling decay per repeat. Each repeat multiplies current effectiveness by (1 - decay%). Example at 6%: 100% -> 94% -> 88.36% -> 83.06%.
